Translations.Text: (GOD's command already issued everything already pisat) so nie rush it He glorified the Vela High daleko any idols they set
He sends angels revelations beriem Jeho commands whomever He zvolit si Jeho servants Ona preach there nie bol inak god Mna Ona reverence Mna
He created heavens zem specific ucel. He bol vela i High daleko any idols they set
He created human tiny kvapka potom he turns into zapalisty opponent
He created zivy inventar ona zadovazit ona warmth vela inaksie benefits i mat rad food
They i zadovazit ona luxury tvoj leisure a when ona cestovat
they beriem tvoj loads zem lenze ona nie zastihnut velka hardship. Iste tvoj Lord je Compassionate Merciful
He created horses mules donkeys ona ride a luxury. Additionally He creates co ona nie zauzlit
GOD points CHODNICEK CHYBNY JEDEN. If He willed He guided all z ona
